name: wikitool
description: Unified MediaWiki tooling for Remilia Wiki

scripts.build: bun run lint && bun run build:core && bun run build:cli
scripts.lint: bun run lint:biome && bun run lint:style
scripts.clean: bun -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const base=path.join(process.cwd(),'packages'); if (!fs.existsSync(base)) process.exit(0); for (const entry of fs.readdirSync(base,{withFileTypes:true})) { if (!entry.isDirectory()) continue; fs.rmSync(path.join(base, entry.name, 'dist'), { recursive: true, force: true }); }"
